Description: An employee suffered multiple serious injuries when he fell approximately 15 metres from a former offshore platform that was being decommissioned by the defendant company. Poor systems of work for assessing and controlling risk were in place, resulting in the company's failure to ensure the safety of all its employees whilst performing demolition work at height.
